name: Vortle
description:
Vortle offers anxiety management and stress relief tools designed for neurodiverse, disabled or mentally ill people.


Download now to instantly experience soothing games, safe spaces, and relaxing activities.

Vortle is a calming app, created to reduce anxiety and improve your mental health. It is a virtual place and relaxing space, where you can escape your current thoughts and enter a world of serenity. Through our tranquil activities and peaceful rooms, you can quickly reduce your stress and anxiety levels. Vortle helps you practice mindfulness and gives you a mental break from your day, your job, or overwhelming thoughts.

No need to register. No need to log in.
